text: João Diogo Fonseca Ferreira (born 22 March 2001) is a Portuguese professional footballer who plays for Benfica B in Liga Portugal 2 as a defender. ==Football career== Born in Póvoa de Varzim, Ferreira made his professional debut with Benfica B in a 2–1 win over Estoril Praia in LigaPro on 11 August 2019. ==Honours== Benfica * UEFA Youth League runner-up: 2019–20 ==References== ==External links== * * *National team update Category:2001 births Category:Living people Category:People from Póvoa de Varzim Category:Portuguese footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Rio Ave F.C. players Category:S.L. Benfica B players Category:LigaPro players Category:Portugal youth international footballers
title: João Ferreira (footballer)
